state.code:
sequenceDiagram
    Actor Gateway
    Gateway->>+UserRoutes: POST "/user/"
    UserRoutes->>+UserService: createUser(email, username, password)
    UserService->>+UserRepository: createUser(email, username, passwordHash, confirmationCode)
    UserRepository->>+UserModel (DB): create({params})
    UserModel (DB)-->>-UserRepository: createdUser
    UserRepository-->>-UserService: createdUser
    UserService->>+nodeMailerConfig: sendConfirmationEmail(username, email, confirmationCode)  
    UserService-->>-UserRoutes: createdUser
    UserRoutes-->>-Gateway: statusCodes "OK"

sequenceDiagram
    Actor Gateway
    Gateway->>+UserRoutes: POST "/user/"
    UserRoutes->>+UserService: createUser(email, username, password)
    UserService->>+nodeMailerConfig: sendConfirmationEmail(username, email, confirmationCode)
    UserService->>+UserRepository: createUser(email, username, passwordHash, confirmationCode)
    UserRepository->>+UserModel (DB): create({params})
    UserModel (DB)-->>-UserRepository: createdUser
    UserRepository-->>-UserService: createdUser
    UserService-->>-UserRoutes: createdUser
    UserRoutes-->>-Gateway: statusCodes "OK"
